text: Farley McGill Mowat (May 12, 1921 - May 6, 2014) was a Canadian author and environmentalist. He wrote many famous Canadian novels such as People of the Deer (1952) and Never Cry Wolf (1963).Rubio, Gerald J. Mowat, Farley . The Canadian Encyclopedia. Mowat was born in Belleville, Ontario. He studied at the University of Toronto. Farley Mowat died on May 6, 2014 in Port Hope, Ontario, less than one week before his 93rd birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1921 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Canadian novelists Category:People from Belleville, Ontario Category:Writers from Ontario Category:University of Toronto alumni
